channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2018-5870|2024-08-05T05:47:55.923Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: While loading a service image, an untrusted pointer dereference can occur in Snapdragon Mobile in versions SD 835, SDA660, SDX24.

item.title: CVE-2018-3589|2024-08-05T04:50:30.279Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before security patch level 2018-04-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile MDM9650, MDM9655, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, the vswr capture size is larger than the maximum size of a diag logPacket, which can lead to a buffer overflow when the sample buffer is copied to the logPacket buffer.
